nodes.text: The Sher Kar was the supreme native predator on the planet Mustafar. They were scorpion-like and larger than humans, and was considered dangerous to them. Sher Kars had three pairs of legs, a mouth with a tongue and teeth, and a long speared tail. They were usually found deep in the nesting grounds of the tulrus, which was the Sher Kars' prey of choice.
